reviewtext: It's a good extension from a good brand and you can't beat the price. Why is limited to 1.1 we may never know.. Great for PS3 controllers and whatnot. Be sure you don't need it for anything that requires speed (external drive etc), or you'll be waiting for a while. At first I thought it was from the 90s or something, but it does say 2012 on the packaging. In what universe do they still make USB 1.1 speed accessories in 2012???For that; you get three of em
